verses.verse: Maschil<WH4905> of Ethan<WH387> the Ezrahite.<WH250> I will sing<WH7891> of the mercies<WH2617> of the LORD<WH3068> for ever:<WH5769> with my mouth<WH6310> will I make known<WH3045> your faithfulness<WH530> to all generations.<WH1755>
For I have said,<WH559> Mercy<WH2617> shall be built<WH1129> up for ever:<WH5769> your faithfulness<WH530> shall you establish<WH3559> in the very heavens.<WH8064>
I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with my chosen,<WH972> I have sworn<WH7650> to David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650>
Your seed<WH2233> will I establish<WH3559> for ever,<WH5769> and build<WH1129> up your throne<WH3678> to all generations.<WH1755> Selah.<WH5542>
And the heavens<WH8064> shall praise<WH3034> your wonders,<WH6382> O LORD:<WH3068> your faithfulness<WH530> also<WH637> in the congregation<WH6951> of the saints.<WH6918>
For who<WH4310> in the heaven<WH7834> can be compared<WH6186> to the LORD?<WH3068> who among the sons<WH1121> of the mighty<WH410> can be likened<WH1819> to the LORD?<WH3068>
God<WH410> is greatly<WH7227> to be feared<WH6206> in the assembly<WH5475> of the saints,<WH6918> and to be had in reverence<WH3372> of all<WH3605> them that are about<WH5439> him.
O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts,<WH6635> who<WH4310> is a strong<WH2626> LORD<WH3050> like<WH3644> to you? or to your faithfulness<WH530> round<WH5439> about you?
You rule<WH4910> the raging<WH1348> of the sea:<WH3220> when the waves<WH1530> thereof arise,<WH7721> you still<WH7623> them.
You have broken<WH1792> Rahab<WH7294> in pieces, as one that is slain;<WH2491> you have scattered<WH6340> your enemies<WH341> with your strong<WH5797> arm.<WH2220>
The heavens<WH8064> are yours, the earth<WH776> also<WH637> is yours: as for the world<WH8398> and the fullness<WH4393> thereof, you have founded<WH3245> them.
The north<WH6828> and the south<WH3225> you have created<WH1254> them: Tabor<WH8396> and Hermon<WH2768> shall rejoice<WH7442> in your name.<WH8034>
You have a mighty<WH1369> arm:<WH2220> strong<WH5810> is your hand,<WH3027> and high<WH7311> is your right<WH3225> hand.<WH3225>
Justice<WH6664> and judgment<WH4941> are the habitation<WH4349> of your throne:<WH3678> mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> shall go<WH6923> before your face.<WH6440>
Blessed<WH835> is the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> the joyful<WH8643> sound:<WH8643> they shall walk,<WH1980> O LORD,<WH3068> in the light<WH216> of your countenance.<WH6440>
In your name<WH8034> shall they rejoice<WH1523> all<WH3605> the day:<WH3117> and in your righteousness<WH6666> shall they be exalted.<WH7311>
For you are the glory<WH8597> of their strength:<WH5797> and in your favor<WH7522> our horn<WH7161> shall be exalted.<WH7311>
For the LORD<WH3068> is our defense;<WH4043> and the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel<WH3478> is our king.<WH4428>

Then<WH227> you spoke<WH1696> in vision<WH2377> to your holy<WH2623> one, and said,<WH559> I have laid<WH7737> help<WH5828> on one that is mighty;<WH1368> I have exalted<WH7311> one chosen<WH970> out of the people.<WH5971>
I have found<WH4672> David<WH1732> my servant;<WH5650> with my holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081> have I anointed<WH4886> him:
With whom<WH834> my hand<WH3027> shall be established:<WH3559> my arm<WH2220> also<WH637> shall strengthen<WH553> him.
The enemy<WH341> shall not exact<WH5378> on him; nor<WH3808> the son<WH1121> of wickedness<WH5766> afflict<WH6031> him.
And I will beat<WH3807> down his foes<WH6862> before his face,<WH6440> and plague<WH5063> them that hate<WH8130> him.
But my faithfulness<WH530> and my mercy<WH2617> shall be with him: and in my name<WH8034> shall his horn<WH7161> be exalted.<WH7311>
I will set<WH7760> his hand<WH3027> also in the sea,<WH3220> and his right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> in the rivers.<WH5104>
He shall cry<WH7121> to me, You are my father,<WH1> my God,<WH410> and the rock<WH6697> of my salvation.<WH3444>
Also<WH637> I will make<WH5414> him my firstborn,<WH1060> higher<WH5945> than the kings<WH4428> of the earth.<WH776>
My mercy<WH2617> will I keep<WH8104> for him for ever more,<WH5769> and my covenant<WH1285> shall stand<WH539> fast with him.
His seed<WH2233> also will I make<WH7760> to endure for ever,<WH5703> and his throne<WH3678> as the days<WH3117> of heaven.<WH8064>
If<WH518> his children<WH1121> forsake<WH5800> my law,<WH8451> and walk<WH3212> not in my judgments;<WH4941>
If<WH518> they break<WH2490> my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> not my commandments;<WH4687>
Then will I visit<WH6485> their transgression<WH6588> with the rod,<WH7626> and their iniquity<WH5771> with stripes.<WH5061>
Nevertheless my loving kindness<WH2617> will I not utterly take<WH6331> from him, nor<WH3808> suffer my faithfulness<WH530> to fail.<WH8266>
My covenant<WH1285> will I not break,<WH2490> nor<WH3808> alter<WH8138> the thing that is gone<WH4161> out of my lips.<WH8193>
Once<WH259> have I sworn<WH7650> by my holiness<WH6944> that I will not lie<WH3576> to David.<WH1732>
His seed<WH2233> shall endure<WH1961> for ever,<WH5769> and his throne<WH3678> as the sun<WH8121> before<WH5048> me.
It shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5769> as the moon,<WH3394> and as a faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> in heaven.<WH7834> Selah.<WH5542>
But you have cast<WH2186> off and abhorred,<WH3988> you have been wroth<WH5674> with your anointed.<WH4899>
You have made void<WH5010> the covenant<WH1285> of your servant:<WH5650> you have profaned<WH2490> his crown<WH5145> by casting it to the ground.<WH776>
You have broken<WH6555> down all<WH3605> his hedges;<WH1448> you have brought<WH7760> his strong<WH4013> holds<WH4013> to ruin.<WH4288>
All<WH3605> that pass<WH5674> by the way<WH1870> spoil<WH8155> him: he is a reproach<WH2781> to his neighbors.<WH7934>
You have set<WH7311> up the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> of his adversaries;<WH6862> you have made all<WH3605> his enemies<WH341> to rejoice.<WH8055>
You have also<WH637> turned<WH7725> the edge<WH6697> of his sword,<WH2719> and have not made him to stand<WH6965> in the battle.<WH4421>
You have made his glory<WH2892> to cease,<WH7673> and cast<WH4048> his throne<WH3678> down to the ground.<WH776>
The days<WH3117> of his youth<WH5934> have you shortened:<WH7114> you have covered<WH5844> him with shame.<WH955> Selah.<WH5542>
How<WH5704> long,<WH5704> LORD?<WH3068> will you hide<WH5641> yourself for ever?<WH5331> shall your wrath<WH2534> burn<WH1197> like fire?<WH784>
Remember<WH2142> how<WH4100> short<WH2465> my time is: why<WH5921> <WH4100> have you made all<WH3605> men<WH1121> <WH120> in vain?<WH7723>
What<WH4310> man<WH1397> is he that lives,<WH2421> and shall not see<WH7200> death?<WH4194> shall he deliver<WH4422> his soul<WH5315> from the hand<WH3027> of the grave?<WH7585> Selah.<WH5542>
Lord,<WH136> where<WH346> are your former<WH7223> loving kindnesses,<WH2617> which you swore<WH7650> to David<WH1732> in your truth?<WH530>
Remember,<WH2142> Lord,<WH136> the reproach<WH2781> of your servants;<WH5650> how I do bear<WH5375> in my bosom<WH2436> the reproach of all<WH3605> the mighty<WH7227> people;<WH5971>
With<WH834> which your enemies<WH341> have reproached,<WH2778> O LORD;<WH3068> with which<WH834> they have reproached<WH2778> the footsteps<WH6119> of your anointed.<WH4899>
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> for ever more.<WH5769> Amen,<WH543> and Amen.<WH543>
